description: The course aims to introduce principles of current experimental techniques used in modern biology. Students will read and discuss papers from the primary literature. Students are expected to have completed at least one course in molecular biology and genetics before taking BIOL 526.
name: EXP MOLECULAR BIOLOGY

values.comments:
The course aims to introduce principles of current experimental techniques used in modern biology.

Students said they learned a lot from this course about techniques in experimental biology. It was a “great overview of science in the field.”

Students found Gallagher sometimes intimidating and unapproachable. Some said that lectures were good but the slides were bad and contained little explanation of material presented.

Students did not comment on the difficulty of the class, only that they wish they had been able to select some of the papers/readings, while others really enjoyed the papers.
